basics.name: Wei Quan Lo
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full Stack Engineer proficient in Java, JavaScript, Golang, and microservices architecture. Experienced in cloud security, workflow optimization, and mentoring junior engineers to drive technical excellence. Skilled in configuring Atlassian products such as Jira, Confluence, and Bitbucket, and leveraging DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines to deliver scalable, high-performing solutions.

work.name: Simplr Logic Sdn Bhd
work.summary: Contributed to key projects for Grab and AmBank, specializing in software development, cloud security, and agile practices.

work.name: CrimsonLogic Pte Ltd
work.summary: Worked on the Coherence Data Exchange Platform (DXP) product team, focusing on data sharing and user subscriptions.

work.name: Yonyou (Malaysia) Sdn Bhd
work.summary: Assisted in implementation of a ERP system.

work.name: Diebold Nixdorf
work.summary: Developed and verified test cases for ATM machines, including designing and executing test scripts to ensure compliance with project requirements

volunteer.summary: Promoted the university and assisted in organizing events and activities for prospective students.

projects.name: Cloud VM Automation in Grab Malaysia
projects.description: Worked as a cloud security engineer to manage cloud instance vulnerabilities and classify CVEs for release approval.
highlights: Automated workflows and maintained pipelines for auto-creating Jira tickets.
Visualized data for feature analysis and consolidated large data into a centralized data lake.

projects.name: Jira Migration in Grab Malaysia
projects.description: Migrated Jira on-premise to Jira Cloud, developed custom Forge App plugins, and configured Jira access.
highlights: Successfully led the migration of the Jira project and delivered it on time.
Developed custom Forge App plugins to optimize workflows and enhance data visibility.
Configured Jira access and prepared data for migration.

projects.name: Digital Lending in AmBank Malaysia
projects.description: Developed a lending application for AmBank from Sprint 0, integrating external services and aligning goals with business objectives.
highlights: Designed modules for the internet banking system, integrated EAI services.
Managed CI/CD pipelines using Openshift Platform and Jenkins.
Collaborated on agile Scrum teams, ensuring timely delivery of features.
Code Reviewed and mentored junior engineers to enhance code quality.

projects.name: Others Projects in AmBank Malaysia
highlights: Removed SMS OTP for system authentication.
Impremented DuitNow with RPP2 feature for online banking.
Implemented eKYC for business account opening.
